quote: The measure of a person’s strength is not his muscular power or strength, but it is his flexibility and adaptability.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: It's not strength, it's PERCEPTION that makes you stronger. If you change how you SEE it, you'll change how you FEEL about it.
author: Yvonne Pierre,  The Day My Soul Cried: A Memoir

quote: Excess of strength alone is proof of strength
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Strength comes from struggle. When you learn to see your struggles as opportunities to become stronger, better, wiser, then your thinking shifts from "I can't do this"to "I must do this.
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: It's not always necessary to be strong, but to feel strong.
author: Jon Krakauer,  Into the Wild

quote: Better to be strong than pretty and useless.
author: Lilith Saintcrow,  Strange Angels

quote: I read somewhere... how important it is in life not necessarily to be strong, but to feel strong... to measure yourself at least once.
author: Jon Krakauer,  Into the Wild

quote: Appear weak when you are strong, and strong when you are weak.
author: Sun Tzu,  The Art of War

quote: You are stronger than you know.
author: Lori Osterman

quote: Let me tell you the secret that has led me to my goal. My strength lies solely in my tenacity.
author: Louis Pasteur

quote: Strength is the capacity to break a Hershey bar into four pieces with your bare hands - and then eat just one of the pieces.
author: Judith Viorst,  Love & Guilt & The Meaning Of Life, Etc

quote: A strong man cannot help a weaker unless the weaker is willing to be helped, and even then the weak man must become strong of himself; he must, by his own efforts, develop the strength which he admires in another. None but himself can alter his condition.
author: James Allen,  As a Man Thinketh

quote: Even strength must bow to wisdom sometimes.
author: Rick Riordan,  The Lightning Thief

quote: The resistance that you fight physically in the gym and the resistance that you fight in life can only build a strong character.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Your inner strength is your outer foundation
author: Allan Rufus

quote: Mental strength induces mind and body.
author: Toba Beta,  My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: Courage isn't having the strength to go on - it is going on when you don't have strength.
author: Napoléon Bonaparte

quote: The strength of a man isn't seen in the power of his arms. It's seen in the love with which he EMBRACES you.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Love is a possible strength in an actual weakness.
author: Thomas Hardy,  Far from the Madding Crowd

quote: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
author: Marcus Aurelius,  Meditations

quote: at your weakest, you end up showing more strength; at your lowest, you are suddenly lifted higher than you’ve ever been. They all border one another, these opposites and show how quickly we can be altered.
author: Cecelia Ahern,  Thanks for the Memories

quote: The strength of a woman is not measured by the impact that all her hardships in life have had on her; but the strength of a woman is measured by the extent of her refusal to allow those hardships to dictate her and who she becomes.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: When you're strong and good, then you're Bad.
author: Michael Jackson

quote: Love is my inner strength and my power.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Holding people away from you, and denying yourself love, that doesn't make you strong. if anything, it makes you weaker. Because you're doing it out of fear.
author: Sarah Dessen,  This Lullaby

quote: Life before Death.Strength before Weakness.Journey before Destination.
author: Brandon Sanderson,  The Way of Kings

quote: Love you will find only where you may show yourself weak without provoking strength.
author: Theodor Adorno

quote: My mother was strong, in all the ways I was weak. She fell, she hurt, she felt. She lived. And for all the tumble of her experiences, she still had hope. Maybe this next time would do the trick. Or maybe not. But unless you stepped into the game, you will never know.
author: Sarah Dessen,  This Lullaby

quote: Strength is Life, Weakness is Death.Expansion is Life, Contraction is Death.Love is Life, Hatred is Death.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Even on my weakest daysI get a little bit stronger
author: Sara Evans

quote: the depth of a person's character is not measured by his or her physical strength, but by the depth of his or her nobility.
author: Frank E. Peretti

quote: I believe a strong woman may be stronger than a man, particularly if she happens to have love in her heart. I guess a loving woman is indestructible.
author: John Steinbeck,  East of Eden

quote: The man armed with knowledge has a better chance of survival than the man who is simply the fittest. Knowledge is the true strength. Muscle is where the myth is.
author: Suzy Kassem,  Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: I want you to be weak. As weak as I am.
author: Milan Kundera,  The Unbearable Lightness of Being

quote: Never forget what you are, for surely the world will not. Make it your strength. Then it can never be your weakness. Armour yourself in it, and it will never be used to hurt you.
author: George R.R. Martin,  A Game of Thrones

quote: You must draw from that strength. You must increase it. And you must hold on to it because sometimes that small glimmer of inner strength is all that we have to help us press forward through the darkness.
author: Morgan Rhodes,  Falling Kingdoms

quote: Give me strength, not to be better than my enemies, but to defeat my greatest enemy, the doubts within myself. Give me strength for a straight back and clear eyes, so when life fades, as the setting sun, my spirit may come to you without shame.
author: P.C. Cast

quote: We cannot prevail by our own might or strength, we need to plug on to the source of our strength so that we will remain resourceful always.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper

quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
author: Vince Lombardi Jr.

quote: Not everything made you stronger. It was possible to survive, yet still be crippled for your trouble. Sometimes it was okay to run away, to skip the test, to chicken out. Or at least to get some help.
author: Scott Westerfeld

quote: Failures can be called ‘strengtheners’ as they make you determined to reach your goal with the lessons they teach.
author: Stephen Richards,  Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

quote: Through strength I found loveIn time I found myself in happiness with you
author: Alexis Jordan

quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack of will.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: I was always looking outside myself for strength and confidence, but it comes from within. It is there all the time.
author: Anna Freud

quote: Never forget what you are, for surely the world will not. Make it your strength. Then it can never be your weakness.
author: George R.R. Martin,  A Song of Ice and Fire, 5-Book Boxed Set: A Game of Thrones, A Clash of Kings, A Storm of Swords, A Feast for Crows, A Dance with Dragons

quote: Try to look at your weakness and convert it into your strength. That's success.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: I am the only force strong enough to stop me.
author: Naya S. Wood

quote: Strong lives are motivated by dynamic purposes.
author: Kenneth Hildebrand

quote: Pain and suffering are the soil of strength and courage.
author: Lurlene McDaniel,  Someone Dies, Someone Lives
